Package game

Class Limbs

java.lang.Object
game.Limbs
public class Limbs
extends java.lang.Object
A Collection of Limb objects.

Limbs represents a collection of Limb objects that an Actor in the zombie game may have.

Provides methods to check how many limbs there are, adding a limb, removing a limb and getting a copy of the collection of limbs.

Use this class to model an Actor in the zombie game having limbs.

Author:
Isaac Lee Kian Min

    • count

      public int count​(TypeOfLimb typeOfLimb)
      Counts the number of a certain type of limb in the collection of limbs.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an integer indicating the number of limbs that are TypeOfLimb type.

    • noMoreType

      public boolean noMoreType​(TypeOfLimb typeOfLimb)
      Is there a specific type of limb?

      This method checks whether the collection of limbs still contains a specific TypeOfLimb

      Parameters:
      typeOfLimb - the TypeOfLimb to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if and only if the collection of limbs contains the specified TypeOfLimb.
